sentences.sContent: Jackson said her boss became increasingly depressed and reverted to smoking heavily.
sentences.sCn: 杰克逊说她的老板变得越来越抑郁，又重新大量吸烟了。

synos.tran: 回复；重提；返祖遗传；归还

remMethod.val: re(反) + vert(转) → 反转 → 恢复

words.tran: 应归还的；可恢复原状的
逆转；回复；归还；[遗] 隔代遗传；[法] 继承权

trans.tranCn: 恢复； 归还， 归属
trans.tranOther: When people or things revert to a previous state, system, or type of behaviour, they go back to it
